#summary Building against a snapshot release of soi-toolkit.

= Building against a snapshot release of soi-toolkit =

Sometimes you might need the latest but not yet released enhancements of soi-toolkit.
Either you download the lastest source from soi-toolkit svn or you build against a snapshot-release of soi-toolkit.

To use a snapshot-release of soi-toolkit you need to update you top-level pom.xml - file:

 * Add a declaration of the soi-toolkit snapshot-maven-repository:
{{{
    <repositories>
        <repository>
            <id>soi-toolkit-snapshot</id>
            <name>soi-toolkit Snapshot Repository</name>
            <url>http://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/snapshots</url>
            <snapshots>
                <enabled>true</enabled>
            </snapshots>
        </repository>
    </repositories>
}}}
 * Update the soi-toolkit-dependency to the snapshot-release:
 (e.g. change 0.1.9 to 0.1.10-SNAPSHOT)
{{{
	<parent>
		<groupId>org.soitoolkit.commons.poms</groupId>
		<artifactId>soitoolkit-default-parent</artifactId>
		<version>0.1.10-SNAPSHOT</version>
	</parent>
}}}

*NOTE*: Remember to revert these changes once you turn back to work with a released version of soi-toolkit!
